alert.note: Alert for Fond du Lac; Ozaukee; Sheboygan; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 6:17PM CDT until July 23 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Ozaukee County in southeastern Wisconsin... Eastern Fond du Lac County in east central Wisconsin... Northeastern Washington County in southeastern Wisconsin... Sheboygan County in east central Wisconsin... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 616 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near St Anna to near Lomira, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sheboygan, Fond Du Lac, Plymouth, Sheboygan Falls, North Fond Du Lac, Howards Grove, Oostburg, Kohler, Cedar Grove, Campbellsport, Random Lake, Elkhart Lake, Southern Lake Winnebago, Taycheedah, Ashford, Greenbush, Eden, Mount Calvary, Cascade and Adell. People attending The Fond du Lac County Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Fond du Lac; Ozaukee; Sheboygan; Washington
